br.span:
DCSC WILL CONTINUE TO DELIVER MEALS FOR OUR STUDENTS.
FOOD ITEMS FOR THE WEEK WILL BE DELIVERED EVERY MONDAY AND WEDNESDAY.

span.br: All items have been precooked. Some items may need to reheated before consumption.

hr.a: E Learning Schedule for April and May 2020

h1.style: font-size: 28px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif; background-color: rgb(244, 244, 244); text-align: center;
h1.img:
Online Registration begins
Tuesday, April 14 for next year's kindergarteners and Pre-K.

h3.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif; background-color: rgb(244, 244, 244); text-align: center;

span.span: If you have a student already in the corporation and wish to add a soon-to-be kindergartener/pre-k, use this link and then click
on New Student Enrollment: Click Here

h3.span: If you are enrolling a new kindergartener or pre-kindergartener and have no older students, click here!

p.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial, "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; background-color: rgb(244, 244, 244); text-align: center;
p.span: If you have questions, please call CECC at 574-686-2362!

span.style: border: none; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 85px; height: 85px;
border: none; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 85px; height: 88px;
border: none; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 85px; height: 85px;

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Cabin, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Cabin, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Providing meals through the Child Nutrition Programs is important to provide needed nutrition to children during our closure due to COVID-19. The method of meal distribution used by our school is based on eligibility, as not all schools can issue meals the same way. We are able to provide meals through the following distribution method: Buses will delivery on Mondays and Wednesdays, in town can pick up at the Delphi High School, at 11:30-12:30, on Mondays and Wednesdays.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Cabin, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Meal pattern rules still apply. We offer students a healthy and nutritious meal that consists of fruits, vegetables, grains, meat/meat alternates, and milk.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Cabin, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Please be aware that not all food provided is shelf-stable. All foods are kept cold, and should be kept cold. Most Entrees are fully cooked but some will need to be reheated.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Cabin, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Our school will provide meals on Monday (2 breakfast and 2 lunches, plus milk), Wednesday (3 breakfast and 3 lunches, plus milk). Only one meal per child per day is allowed even if multiple meals are being handed out at once.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Cabin, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: When picking up meals on Monday and Wednesday from 11:30-12:30, children do not need to be present. Only one set of meals per child. All children 18 and younger may receive meals.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Cabin, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: We will continue to provide the highest quality meals to children during COVID-19 and look forward to meeting important nutritional needs of children during this time.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Cabin, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Cabin, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.strong:
Patrons,
The State issued this Q & A on the Governor's Emergency Stay at Home Order. Please click below for view:

div.p: Delphi Community School Corporation does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district’s activities and programs. Delphi Community School Corporation also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
